description: Signals the UI to enable the command input field for a specific entity, optionally setting its placeholder text, and potentially focusing it.

placeholder.description: The placeholder text to display in the input field when it's empty (e.g., 'Enter command...').

entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity whose turn it is and for whom input is being enabled.

payloadSchema.$comment: This event tells the UI that the game is ready for the next command from a specific entity. The placeholder provides guidance.
